parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the headlamp assembly can cause reduced visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Melted and burnt interior of the headlamp assembly
deteriorated wiring inside and outside the headlamp enclosure
crumbling protective plastic covering over the wires
bare wires touching inside the housing.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrument cluster LED can cause difficulty in determining the vehicle's gear, speed, and other vital information, increasing the risk of accidents, especially at higher speeds.
symptoms: Failure of the gear indicator
failure to display gear information
scrambled or pixelated display
inability to see important information such as time
outside temperature
etc.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Trunk Release and Battery Location Design Flaw
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaw can leave the vehicle stranded, as the battery is located in the trunk and the trunk cannot be opened when the battery is dead, making it impossible to jump-start the car.
symptoms: Trunk will not open with the manual key
battery is dead
and the vehicle cannot be jump-started.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the shifter lever can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: Transmission refuses to shift
shifter lever becomes inoperative or erratic
vehicle cannot shift from low gear
and transmission becomes stuck in a particular gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electronic transmission control system can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: Transmission refuses to shift
shifter lever becomes inoperative or erratic
vehicle cannot shift from low gear
and transmission becomes stuck in a particular gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition system can cause the vehicle to shift into gear without the key in the ignition, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: Vehicle shifts into gear without the key in the ignition
vehicle rolls backwards or forwards without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Front Bumper Clearance and Design
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The low clearance and weak design of the front bumper cover/air dam can cause it to break or crack when coming into contact with wheel stops in parking lots, potentially leading to a safety hazard and costly repairs.
symptoms: The front bumper cover/air dam breaks or cracks when parking in public lots
especially when bringing the front tires within a foot of the wheel stops; the bumper hangs loose after breaking; repeated instances of breaking or cracking occur due to the design flaw.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft position sensor can cause the engine to shut off unexpectedly, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: The engine shuts off or refuses to turn over when hot
the engine shuts off at traffic lights or when idling
the engine will not start when hot
but starts after 20-30 minutes of cooling down
the battery keeps cranking but the engine does not start.
